Detailed Description

TransportKeyData Parameter for an Application Master or Link Key. See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.19, page 457.

Definition at line 215 of file apsmeTransportKey.h.

Field Documentation

bool APS_IndApplicationMasterOrLinkKeyTransportData_t::initiatorFlag

This parameter indicates this device was initiator or not.

Definition at line 218 of file apsmeTransportKey.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_IndApplicationMasterOrLinkKeyTransportData_t::partnerAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that was also sent this master key.

uint8_t APS_IndApplicationMasterOrLinkKeyTransportData_t::key[SECURITY_KEY_SIZE]

The master or link key (as indicated by the KeyType parameter).
